Articles.Content:
Since everyone is playing the same game with all the same attributes (I guess unless the game starts planets in random locations) shouldn't there be a launch calendar for each planet somewhere?

ie

Eve best launches are year 3 day 56 year 3 day 112

Duna best launches are year 0 day 16 year 0 day 242

Jool best launches are year 4 day 212

and so forth...

Yes, there is.

(Not mine, but I think someone else on the forum generated it)

Yes, there is.

Yay! I'm useful! Careful though - that thing was made before Kerbin time was introduced to the game so it uses Earth days.

It also doesn't include Moho.

Moho approaches are a mess, and, in my admittedly limited experience, rarely done directly.

Besides, Moho orbits so quickly, the windows are so frequent that you don't really need a calendar

http://www.eiden.fi/ksp/

pick your flight, such as Kerbin to duna:

http://www.eiden.fi/ksp/phaseangle-Kerbin-Duna.txt

or Duna to Eeloo (if you want to do that for some reason)

http://www.eiden.fi/ksp/phaseangle-Duna-Eeloo.txt

But to use the same warning:

Careful though - that thing was made before Kerbin time was introduced to the game so it uses Earth days.

I think you can still change your clock setting to display Earth days
Also, the Kerbal Alarm Clock mod has transfer window alarms. So, you can set the alarm for whichever transfer window you want.
